name: Bridge Club
description: Bridge is an international sport! American Bridge Federation supports young players and one of our students went to three countries for free - China, Italy and Turkey to represent USA at the World Championships. No prior knowledge is required to become a member of the club. You will learn how to play, you will make friends (it's a partnership game), and you will have fun!

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Every Friday after school in Room 326.
